verses.text: \w Then|strong="H7126"\w* \w I|strong="H3027"\w* \w heard|strong="H6963"\w* \w Him|strong="H7121"\w* \w call|strong="H7121"\w* \w out|strong="H1419"\w* \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w loud|strong="H1419"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w*, \w saying|strong="H6963"\w*, “\w Draw|strong="H7126"\w* \w near|strong="H7126"\w*, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w executioners|strong="H6486"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H7121"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, \w each|strong="H5892"\w* \w with|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w weapon|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* destruction \w in|strong="H5892"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w saw|strong="H2009"\w* \w six|strong="H8337"\w* men \w coming|strong="H2009"\w* \w from|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w direction|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w Upper|strong="H5945"\w* \w Gate|strong="H8179"\w*, \w which|strong="H4196"\w* \w faces|strong="H6437"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w*, \w each|strong="H8179"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w weapon|strong="H3627"\w* \w of|strong="H3027"\w* \w slaughter|strong="H4660"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*. \w With|strong="H3847"\w* \w them|strong="H3027"\w* \w was|strong="H3027"\w* \w another|strong="H3627"\w* \w man|strong="H8179"\w* \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* linen \w who|strong="H5975"\w* \w had|strong="H3027"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w writing|strong="H7083"\w* kit \w at|strong="H5975"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* \w side|strong="H6828"\w*. \w And|strong="H3027"\w* \w they|strong="H5608"\w* \w came|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H8432"\w* \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w beside|strong="H3027"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5178"\w* \w altar|strong="H4196"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* God \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w rose|strong="H5927"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w above|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w cherubim|strong="H3742"\w*, \w where|strong="H1004"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w been|strong="H1961"\w*, \w and|strong="H3478"\w* moved \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w threshold|strong="H4670"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w He|strong="H1004"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* man \w clothed|strong="H3847"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* linen \w who|strong="H3478"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w writing|strong="H7083"\w* kit \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7121"\w* \w side|strong="H4975"\w*.

“\w Go|strong="H5674"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*,” said \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*, “\w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w put|strong="H6213"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w mark|strong="H8420"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w foreheads|strong="H4696"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* sighing \w and|strong="H3068"\w* groaning \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w abominations|strong="H8441"\w* \w committed|strong="H6213"\w* \w there|strong="H3605"\w*.”

\w And|strong="H5869"\w* \w as|strong="H5892"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* listened, \w He|strong="H5921"\w* said \w to|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* others, “Follow \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w through|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w and|strong="H5869"\w* start \w killing|strong="H5221"\w*; \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H5674"\w* \w show|strong="H2347"\w* \w pity|strong="H2347"\w* \w or|strong="H5892"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* anyone!

\w Slaughter|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w old|strong="H2205"\w* \w men|strong="H2205"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* young \w men|strong="H2205"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w maidens|strong="H1330"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w women|strong="H1330"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w children|strong="H2945"\w*; \w but|strong="H3605"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w not|strong="H6440"\w* \w go|strong="H5066"\w* \w near|strong="H5066"\w* \w anyone|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w mark|strong="H8420"\w*. \w Now|strong="H5921"\w* \w begin|strong="H2490"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w My|strong="H3605"\w* \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*.” \w So|strong="H5066"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w began|strong="H2490"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w elders|strong="H2205"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* \w were|strong="H1004"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H3318"\w* \w He|strong="H1004"\w* told \w them|strong="H5221"\w*, “\w Defile|strong="H2930"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w temple|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w fill|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w courts|strong="H2691"\w* \w with|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w*. \w Go|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w*!” \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H5221"\w* \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w and|strong="H1004"\w* began \w killing|strong="H5221"\w* \w throughout|strong="H5892"\w* \w the|strong="H5221"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w*.

\w While|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* \w killing|strong="H5221"\w*, \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w left|strong="H7604"\w* \w alone|strong="H7604"\w*. \w And|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H5921"\w* \w fell|strong="H5307"\w* \w facedown|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3478"\w* \w cried|strong="H2199"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w*, “Oh, \w Lord|strong="H3069"\w* \w GOD|strong="H3068"\w*, \w when|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w pour|strong="H8210"\w* \w out|strong="H8210"\w* \w Your|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w You|strong="H6440"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w entire|strong="H3605"\w* \w remnant|strong="H7611"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*?”

\w He|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5771"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w exceedingly|strong="H3966"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w*. \w The|strong="H7200"\w* land \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w bloodshed|strong="H1818"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w city|strong="H5892"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* perversity. \w For|strong="H3588"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w*, ‘\w The|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H7200"\w* land; \w the|strong="H7200"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w does|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3588"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.’

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H1571"\w* \w for|strong="H5869"\w* \w Me|strong="H5414"\w*, \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w look|strong="H5869"\w* \w on|strong="H1870"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w* \w with|strong="H7218"\w* \w pity|strong="H2347"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w spare|strong="H2550"\w* \w them|strong="H5414"\w*. \w I|strong="H5414"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w bring|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w deeds|strong="H1870"\w* \w down|strong="H1870"\w* \w upon|strong="H5414"\w* \w their|strong="H5414"\w* \w own|strong="H5869"\w* \w heads|strong="H7218"\w*.”

\w Then|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* man \w clothed|strong="H3830"\w* \w in|strong="H6213"\w* linen \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w writing|strong="H7083"\w* kit \w at|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* \w side|strong="H4975"\w* \w reported|strong="H7725"\w* \w back|strong="H7725"\w*, “\w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w as|strong="H1697"\w* \w You|strong="H6680"\w* \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.”
